comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- this should be corrected to Liggett, not Leggett. Other Bain/LOC photos of General Hunter Liggett, commander of the 50th anniveresary encampment at Gettysburg: www.flickr.com/search/?q=leggett&w=8623220@N02

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Wystan: Thank you for the correction. We'll correct our data for this and the other related photos.
